summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, releasing two (2) easements for an electric distribution system across properties at 1588 NE Serpentine Place, Shoreline, WA; and 12040 through 12044 31st Avenue NE (P.M.\#260409-2-016, P.M.\#260428-1-017), and partially releasing an easement for an electric distribution system across 12554 Ashworth Avenue N., Seattle, WA (P.M.\#260419-4-015B).
